description: "Returns the tag configuration for the given metric name."
sidebar_label: "List tag configuration by name"

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List tag configuration by name</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v2/metrics/{metric_name}/tags"}></MethodEndpoint>


Returns the tag configuration for the given metric name.
## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The name of the metric.","example":"dist.http.endpoint.request","in":"path","name":"metric_name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>Success</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}} className={"response-body-description-container"}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"5px"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>data</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"5px"}} className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>Object for a single metric tag configuration.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>attributes</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"5px"}} className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>Object containing the definition of a metric tag configuration attributes.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>aggregations</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"5px"}} className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>A list of queryable aggregation combinations for a count, rate, or gauge metric.By default, count and rate metrics require the (time: sum, space: sum) aggregation andGauge metrics require the (time: avg, space: avg) aggregation.Additional time & space combinations are also available:- time: avg, space: avg- time: avg, space: max- time: avg, space: min- time: avg, space: sum- time: count, space: sum- time: max, space: max- time: min, space: min- time: sum, space: avg- time: sum, space: sumCan only be applied to metrics that have a `metric_type` of `count`, `rate`, or `gauge`.</div><li className={"opening-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"space"} required={true} schemaName={"MetricCustomSpaceAggregation"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`avg`, `max`, `min`, `sum`]"} schema={{"description":"A space aggregation for use in query.","enum":["avg","max","min","sum"],"example":"sum","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["AVG","MAX","MIN","SUM"],"title":"MetricCustomSpaceAggregation"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"time"} required={true} schemaName={"MetricCustomTimeAggregation"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`avg`, `count`, `max`, `min`, `sum`]"} schema={{"description":"A time aggregation for use in query.","enum":["avg","count","max","min","sum"],"example":"sum","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["AVG","COUNT","MAX","MIN","SUM"],"title":"MetricCustomTimeAggregation"}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"created_at"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Timestamp when the tag configuration was created.","example":"2020-03-31T09:48:37.463835Z","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"include_percentiles"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Toggle to turn on/off percentile aggregations for distribution metrics.\nOnly present when the `metric_type` is `distribution`.","example":true,"type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"metric_type"} required={false} schemaName={"MetricTagConfigurationMetricTypes"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`gauge`, `count`, `rate`, `distribution`]"} schema={{"default":"gauge","description":"The metric's type.","enum":["gauge","count","rate","distribution"],"example":"count","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["GAUGE","COUNT","RATE","DISTRIBUTION"],"title":"MetricTagConfigurationMetricTypes"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"modified_at"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Timestamp when the tag configuration was last modified.","example":"2020-03-31T09:48:37.463835Z","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List of tag keys on which to group.","example":["app","datacenter"],"items":{"description":"Tag keys to group by.","type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"MetricName"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The metric name for this resource.","example":"test.metric.latency","type":"string","title":"MetricName"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"MetricTagConfigurationType"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`manage_tags`]"} schema={{"default":"manage_tags","description":"The metric tag configuration resource type.","enum":["manage_tags"],"example":"manage_tags","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["MANAGE_TAGS"],"title":"MetricTagConfigurationType"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"data\": {\n    \"attributes\": {\n      \"aggregations\": [\n        {\n          \"space\": \"avg\",\n          \"time\": \"avg\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"created_at\": \"2020-03-31T09:48:37.463835Z\",\n      \"metric_type\": \"gauge\",\n      \"modified_at\": \"2020-04-31T09:48:37.463835Z\",\n      \"tags\": [\n        \"app\",\n        \"datacenter\"\n      ]\n    },\n    \"id\": \"http.request.latency\",\n    \"type\": \"manage_tags\"\n  }\n}"}
